main event: Two bright yellow objects were observed in the sky over Long Island, Kentucky, on February 5, 1954.
interesting points: The objects were round and about 3 feet in diameter,The objects were observed at 1,000 and 1,500 feet by different witnesses,The sighting lasted between 40 to 60 seconds,Two witnesses from Grumman Aircraft Corporation reported similar objects at 4,000 feet in New York at the same time,There was insufficient data for further evaluation of the sighting.
witness description: witnesses included personnel from Grumman Aircraft Corporation and a private pilot
